Text:
Great quality! And love the movie! Thanks!

Subtitles out of sync tho!

It seems to be some kind of extended cut,
cause this version is few minutes longer than the other version I have,
and the subtitles in it are for the shorter version,
thats why the subtitles don't fit :)

But once again V:10 & A:10

I extended the subtitles for myself, if anyone interested I can upload them?
